title: The Colombo Plan
creator_contributor_role: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/International cooperation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/International economic relations
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Economic assistance - Asia, Southeastern
description: A cartoon film on the Colombo Plan which links a number of countries throughout the world pledged to improve each other's economic conditions. To increase prosperity and make the earth fruitful, technical knowledge and experience, equipment and funds, are essential before progress can be made. This cartoon shows how, in the past ten years, the people of Colombo Plan countries are benefitting from co-operation.
